The shuttle runs only every hour until 5 pm
To get to the free shuttle service it is far from our tower in short inside movement is tiring In fact to even to get to Uber we need to go all the way to the main entrance from our tower
Could be easily tackled if there was a 24hour free shuttle to and from the Strip centre Belagio fountains or similar every half an hour or so

The Courtesy bus was good but could have been a little more frequent and although the traffic is heavier at night due to the local surroundings it did not feel good to be walking back late at night the bus would have been a help
Also the hotel is not located in the Strip it is around a 10 15 minutes walk
However this definitely has a smaller and quieter vibe than many of the hotels on the strip but given its location off the strip this is n’t really surprising
Service for free shuttle not good
